author: cskiraly
content:
I've seen the PR on adding to Metadata, and it makes sense, but going back to your original question:
> How are other clients currently finding peers for data column rpcs? 
> 
> ENR isn't always available - we never get them if a peer connects to us. Do clients fallback to the CUSTODY_REQUIREMENT if enr is not present?

It feels to me that ENR should be shared as part of the connect flow, or at least there should be a GetENR request. At the moment it seems to me that ENR has a (important?) role, yet it is only propagated through side-channel (discv5), and not through libp2p. Is that intentional?

author: manunlp
content: <@857052906495017000> by any chance can you take a look at this issue? Don't hesitate if something is unclear.

author: cskiraly
content: Yep, I already have an answer half written, just not yet finished and sent. Will be back to my laptop soon, and sending it.

content: I will only get to it tomorrow, sorry.
